What I'm saying applies to literally anyone who ridicules others for their interests. Whether it be someone who likes vanilla who's trash talking some random NTR-lover, or some rape-lover who's being a dick and insulting people who enjoy vanilla. In both cases, mind your business. I myself don't get the appeal of NTR because I honestly just CAN'T see what's so arousing about it. So instead of worrying about other peoples business, keep calm and masturbate to anime tits.

You'd think that both ways- including me- but no, I hate the idea in general not the fuckheads who masturbate to it. The hell do I care what the fuck you masturbate to just fuck off mind your business. I don't need some random retard on the internet judging me for what I get off to. I hate NTR, what're you gonna do about it? Nothing. End of discussion. You shouldn't even fucking care in the first place, does it bother you that people have more mild tastes than you do? Cause if so, no one gives a shit. And that's all there is to it.

I fucking hate NTR. So I hate both blacklisted it and subtracted it from my search (alongside a shit load of other trash tags), problem solved. I don't give a shit about to people who get off to it (though I don't understand why), I just don't want anything to do with NTR. But even so, I see all these worthless pieces of trash shit talking random people who genuinely enjoy the doujins like this, just BEGGING for attention. That's the fucking problem they just want to harass people because they're pieces of shit who can't mind their own damn business.
